aka: Die ewige Nacht der zwölf Monde
The Eternal Night of Twelve Moons
this_title: La eterna noche de las doce lunas
trans_title: 十二个月亮的永恒之夜
Die ewige Nacht der zwölf Monde
The Eternal Night of Twelve Moons
introduction: In the tradition of the indigenous Wayuu community, girls on the eve of puberty should live in isolation for a period of twelve moons. Using documentary imagery, this film shows young Pili as she prepares for her role as a woman.
chinese_title: 十二个月亮的永恒之夜
foreign_title: La eterna noche de las doce lunas
